meanings.sent1: I need a cablet to connect the computer to the printer.
meanings.sent2: The cablet was too short to reach the outlet.
meanings.sent3: The tiny cablet got tangled with the headphones in my bag.
meanings.sent4: Her friendship was like a sturdy cablet, always there to support me.
meanings.sent5: The cablet, thin but strong, held the weight of the hanging plant.

meanings.definition: A small, flexible wire used for electrical connections.
meanings.sent1: The electrician used a cablet to fix the broken socket.
meanings.sent2: She carefully inserted the cablet into the circuit board.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the colorful cablet, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: His words were like an intricate cablet, connecting people from different backgrounds.
meanings.sent5: The cablet, with its copper core, conducted electricity efficiently.
